website_summaries.verdict: An affordable chipping hammer made of hardened steel that gets the job done.
pros: Head is pointed on one end and flat on the other, enabling the user to access tough spots
Spring handle absorbs some of the shock
cons: There are occasional consumer complaints about tool durability

customer_reviews.title: Simple little tool- works great for painting prep
customer_reviews.text: Such a funny little took but exactly what we needed for kicking rust chunks off a sucker rod fence (along with a wire brush) before we painted it for the umpteenth time.
customer_reviews.author: Somebody's Mother

customer_reviews.title: It's a working welding hammer.
customer_reviews.text: It's a welding hammer. It works. What more do you need to know?
customer_reviews.author: Exhausted Elmer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for stick welding.
customer_reviews.text: Good chipping hammer. As good as any I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Oder

customer_reviews.title: He has used it several times and is amazed at what it can do
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son, he had just gotten a welder for Christmas. He has used it several times and is amazed at what it can do;
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Webber

customer_reviews.title: A great chipper
customer_reviews.text: My son in law loves this,his welding projects are not all that many but as he says, when you need this tool you are really glad you have it. It has worked perfectly on his 1st project. He told others about this and they have ordered it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne Schubert

customer_reviews.title: Good for stick weld
customer_reviews.text: Good hammer for stick welding. If you are stick welding and aren't chipping off the slag then you can't properly inspect your weld. If you go at it too much with the hammer then you'll start denting your actual weld material. Let it cool all the way then chip and brush off.
customer_reviews.author: ClLy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: At age 45, I awoke and decided to stop putting off my dream of welding art. I was a bit intimidated at first, but this equipment works like a dream. And in under a month I've sold my first peace of art.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Inge Repair Pro RVA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is what it is...hard to screw up a piece of metal.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed, found it to be a very nice hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Wilfred R.

customer_reviews.title: What a Weldign Hammer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome, practical welding hammer I've every used. It is also the only I've ever used and it does exactly what it is intended to do. I'm not sure how to review a welding hammer but I guess I can say for the money it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: ECI-Tampa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This hammer is simple cheap and it does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Nothing remarkable, it gets the job done and it's cheap!. Looks decently built and I have no complaints whatsoever. Recommended if you're looking for a cheap alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Chaverri

customer_reviews.title: Good hammer
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for a couple months now easy to sharpen and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lopez

customer_reviews.title: chipping hammer
customer_reviews.text: Good hammer good price. These are not intended for hard banging but rather pecking, chipping and scraping. Does what it should at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Trent

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent chipping hammer and for the low price I have to say it's very good. It'll be around a long while helping me along with some projects.
customer_reviews.author: Brionix

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great little chipping hammer. I'm just a beginner, but got it to bang off the slag from arc welding. Comfortable in the hand and does the job
customer_reviews.author: A. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: It seems to get rid of slag okay, but honestly the harbor freight tools are cheaper and just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Sunbakd1

customer_reviews.title: It's a hammer, and it's fine
customer_reviews.text: What bad can you say about a hammer. It works.
customer_reviews.author: RichieRichinFL

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I used it a couple of times, very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: GOOD DEAL FOR THE BUCK!!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped for this everywhere, and I found this on Amazon.com. It was a great price, an I couldn't turn it down. SW

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Fair pricing and works as designed. Really can't say more.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I discarded my chipping hammer years ago and this is a decent replica although it is NOT American made

customer_reviews.title: Not too hard to screw this one up.
customer_reviews.text: It's not made from the heaviest material or anything, but it works just fine for what it cost.

customer_reviews.title: Welding Chipping Hammer
customer_reviews.text: Item is actually as pictured. Item delivered on time as promised. I would recommend this product to anyone. Works as it should no complaints.

customer_reviews.title: it will be fine
customer_reviews.text: whats to say. it's a chipping hammer. it will be fine

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Really smooth easy to hold on handle. Nice weight distribution. Really nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: schooling mom

customer_reviews.title: it does what it says, for a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: Came as advertised. No frills but well built and will work just fine for knocking the slag off. I ordered this as an add-on.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cheap gets the job done works great for chipping away spatter or removing clay. comes pretty sharp and coated in a durable paint.
customer_reviews.author: STAIT

customer_reviews.title: Great hammer, not a great deal
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was going to be a great deal, sadly I found it at Lowes for $6. Otherwise a fine quality tool.
customer_reviews.author: JustJax

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It's a chipping hammer. It works very well for it's intended purpose. Just remember to wear eye protection and don't hit yourself on the thumb!
customer_reviews.author: Miles Archer

customer_reviews.title: Need a chipping hammer this is it.
customer_reviews.text: excellent price. It does the job. The price was right and does the job. not to big and not to small.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bourquin

customer_reviews.title: for the price this is a great hammer! I use it with my second welder ...
customer_reviews.text: for the price this is a great hammer ! I use it with my second welder on my spare truck it performs great !
customer_reviews.author: Bitchin Camaro

customer_reviews.title: Chip Away.....
customer_reviews.text: Just like it says, it's an Economy chipping hammer.....but for a causal welder, this serves it's purpose. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley A. Helms

customer_reviews.title: Cheap yet Solid
customer_reviews.text: Cheap chipping hammer that gets the job done. I used it to peen some welds on a cast header and it turned out wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: MECH-E

customer_reviews.title: US Forge Welding Chipping Hammer
customer_reviews.text: This US Forge chipping hammer has been working well at doing what it's designed for, which is removing slag and weld spatter. I like the simple all metal design with no plastic or vinyl grips to get chewed up, melted or otherwise damaged. I can't seem to find any marking on the tool itself or the tag that was attached to it that indicate where it was manufactured, but the price was right and it serves the purpose, so would recommend it to someone that needs one.
customer_reviews.author: SJK

customer_reviews.title: chipping hammer
customer_reviews.text: Its a chipping hammer, it works as advertised. does exactly what its supposed to do. made of quality merican steel!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works just like it is suppose to, good price too
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A hammer is a hammer and this one worked as it should
customer_reviews.author: Philip A. Sterck

customer_reviews.title: very good-Sturdy enough for hobbyist uses
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase, its sturdy and works perfect for garage projects. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Azael O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It well do the job. You probli leave it somewhere an buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This US Forge Welding Economy Chipping Hammer works just as well as any other chipping hammer I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: T.B.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded My Expectation
customer_reviews.text: The item purchased has met all my expectations, and I would gladly purchase this item again in the very near future.

customer_reviews.title: hammer
customer_reviews.text: my son had a hammer that had steel tips on a plastic hammer. He was delighted to get the hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: You could go to your local welding supply company and pay more, don't . Just order this chipping hammerand if you use them a lot buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Waylon

customer_reviews.title: chipping hammer
customer_reviews.text: It works as well as I expected. It doesn't have any flaws as far as I can tell. I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Burch

customer_reviews.title: Chipping Hammer
customer_reviews.text: Just the ticket for doing brake jobs on all our vehicles and saved us a small fortune on unexpected repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Joy LaFountain

customer_reviews.title: great hammer
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little hammer for the price. It has a nice sharp point for chipping into beads. This is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should, no hassles, no frills, and no issues with this one, just a plain basic good solid tool for the money.

customer_reviews.title: Exchanged for this one
customer_reviews.text: I brought my first purchase back to buy this one. Does the job at a reasonable price. Can recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Horaser Jung

customer_reviews.title: Good hammer
customer_reviews.text: I was ordering some other stuff and needed $7 more to qualify for free shipping. The shipping on the original order was going to be a fair amount more then this hammer, so I added to the cart (in a sense it was free). I've only used it for a few days now, but seems very solid & am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, it does the job. Nothing fancy, but does it need to be?
customer_reviews.author: Weebus

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Does the job of knocking off excess weld very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Erdahl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results.
customer_reviews.text: I rate this product that meets the objectives. With hard work and patience, you will achieve your goals. Excellent product.

customer_reviews.title: Chipping Hammer
customer_reviews.text: This chipping hammer will be used a lot, It is perfect size for the items that I make in my forge.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: chipping hammer
customer_reviews.text: very good quality for the money expected less its all one would need as the jobs you would do at home would not require a professional grade one
customer_reviews.author: David Lauman

customer_reviews.title: Love my hammer
customer_reviews.text: I love the hammer. Just what I needed. Had one years ago, glad to have a new one like this.
customer_reviews.author: Linn

customer_reviews.title: Chipping Hammer
customer_reviews.text: The hammer is light weight. It could be bigger and heavier. It is useful for small jobs. A wire brush and light sanding works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Q.

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong
customer_reviews.text: It works all the time good price good product cant really mess this one up. I do like the metal handle lets me bend or modify them to my needs.

customer_reviews.title: Soft metal
customer_reviews.text: The hammer appears to be of high quality but it bent very quickly while chipping at slag on the first two swings.
customer_reviews.author: SSG Shawn

customer_reviews.title: slug  hamer
customer_reviews.text: so far its working good its not chiping the handle fits good in my hand it woud be better if hand was padded alittle but its pretty good

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hammer as a Christmas gift for my husband. I don't know anything about forging, welding or for that matter hammering...although I can hammer fairly well...so I don't know what to say about this one except that it looks like the picture, appears to be well made and my husband likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: lot better than my homemade
customer_reviews.text: not much to say this product does what it is supposed to price was not bad I just needed replacement I tend to lose these things it works
customer_reviews.author: Jody Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, affordable
customer_reviews.text: Well-made, and all metal. I've only used this a little bit so far, but have no doubt that it will hold up to anything I can dish out in the garage. The price makes this an affordable addition to the home welder's arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: ihsan

customer_reviews.title: Good welder's hammer for the money
customer_reviews.text: Received the product in ample time for my next project. Used it to chip away some slag, and it appears to do the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: JD Rider

customer_reviews.title: lol
customer_reviews.text: Its a chipping hammer. Its a hammer...that chips! what more could you ask for? ok ok for those of you who want an actual review here is goes. This pretty durable. The chisel side doesnt dull very easily and i rarely have use for the other side. sometimes i bang it on something just to test it out and it s awesome. I really only posted all that because amazon requires at least 20 words.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hammonds

customer_reviews.title: It's a chipping hammer...
customer_reviews.text: It's a welding chipping hammer, there's not much to say. It takes off slag, and works as a makeshift pry bar when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: standard chipping hammer
customer_reviews.text: works well to chip out slag yes id buy another when needed. just wished it came with a hook to use on my welding cart
customer_reviews.author: John M. Geones

customer_reviews.title: what can i say, works
customer_reviews.text: pretty nice chipping hammer, it gets the job done although you might want to sharpen it a little more i like my chizzles and edged tools sharp, so a little sharp isn't asking too much.
customer_reviews.author: joyce kahn

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend as a present as he was new to welding and needing some tools to go with it. It works well and does the job. I suggest it to anyone that is a welder.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this product, works well and good price with free shipping. I will definitely buy another when I need one.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Broke within an hour
customer_reviews.text: It broke within one hour of use. I had purchased a second one and that one broke within two hours. The head fell off. I just welded it back on. So no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Rajca

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: This is a good chipping hammer. I can't imagine a better design. Works great. The grip is especially nice. It's just the right amount of hardness. Soft enough to deform itself rather than chip, hard enough to to dislodge slag in predictable ways.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly, but the paint on it smells god-awful ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, but the paint on it smells god-awful. Will have to wirebrush it off and probably heat treat it. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: GiveMeYourToothbrush

customer_reviews.title: overpriced low quality tool from china
customer_reviews.text: Hammer is fine and will do the job. However, the hammer is made in China as clearly indicated on sticker. The name of the product "US Forge" and that an American flag is shown on the label is therefore contradictory and clearly deceptive. -1 star. Additionally, the part had some peeling in the powder coating on the hammer shaft. -1 star. Finally, an almost copy of this hammer from China can be had from harbor freight for 5 dollars (1/2 this price), and the harbor freight hammers don't have any chips in the paint, -1 star. Still, the hammer is decent and will do the job, but clearly is not worth 10 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used yet, looks to be quality built. ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet, looks to be quality built. Will update in a few weeks after I have had a chance to test it out.
customer_reviews.author: Bill N.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself $4 and buy the identical item, of a different brand, from Home Depot for $5.
customer_reviews.author: mdski

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Like this product, It said economy Chipping Hammer in the title and I thought it was going to be a cheap little hammer. I bought it just to get free shipping withe the purchase of another product. upon arrival i was amazed of the quality not a chepoo, great size not to light nether too heavy. arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: chipping hammer
customer_reviews.text: this is a pretty handy little hammer i like the powder coat and it was a really competitive pricing, and it arrived early
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: hammering
customer_reviews.text: Got this for welding class and it does the job well. Sturdy but price was a little high. I'll shop around next time

customer_reviews.title: Paint flaking off from the minute I opened it. ...
customer_reviews.text: Paint flaking off from the minute I opened it. Double the price of the same hammer from Sears or Harbor Freight.

customer_reviews.title: hot lead
customer_reviews.text: contains lead, according to the warning sticker that came on it.

customer_reviews.title: kpp
customer_reviews.text: great chipping hammer , im a home owner handyman and this stands up to the job,price is right and i would recommend to buy this product,

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Head flew off while using it but i tac welded it back on and it works fine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a hammer, it works. Not too much to add

customer_reviews.text: so far appears to be a solid tool. I've only used it a couple of times but happy with it so far.

product_meta.title: US Forge Welding Economy Chipping Hammer
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Economy chipping hammer is made of steel with a spring-type handle, the hammer is designed to absorb the shock of contact while cleaning and chipping away welding debris. Incorporates drop forged heat treated head, the head is welded to the steel shaft to ensure safety and longer life.
feature_bullets: Made of hardened steel for longer tool life
Spring handle designed to absorb the shock of contact while cleaning and shipping way welding debris
Heads have a chisel on one side and a point on the other to get into tight spots

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars289 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
